info.description: # Endpoint The endpoint for the sandbox integrations environment is: https://sandbox.apicenter.eagleview.com.
info.title: Measurement Order API Documentation

tags.name: Ordering
tags.description: The EagleView ordering process offers many API methods which allow for varying degrees of customization. Ordering is the first step in the EagleView structure measurement process, as it kickstarts the report creation process.

tags.name: Order Status
tags.description: Once the report has been created in the Ordering stage, it is possible to query the status of the order via Order Status API methods.

tags.name: Order Adjustments
tags.description: Occasionally, a report will need to be adjusted by the customer before it can continue processing. This could be due to a necessary upgrade/downgrade due to the image quality available.

tags.name: Retrieving Files
tags.description: Once a report has completed processing, it is possible to retrieve it via Retrieving Files API methods.

FileType.description: FileType extension of the given file

productGroup.description: Product group name. This field is deprecated and will return a null value.

isTemporarilyUnavailable.description: Indicates the availability of the product to order.

IsRoofProduct.description: Indicates if this is a roof product.

AllowsUserSubmittedPhotos.description: Denotes if this PDF report can display user submitted photos.

Pitch.description: Slope of roof of the building

RoofArea.description: Total roof area for the corresponding pitch

PercentageRoofArea.description: Total percentage of the roof area covered by the corresponding pitch

MiterCountInside.description: Number of interior right-angle wall corners

MiterCountOutside.description: Number of exterior right-angle wall corners

ReportId.description: Unique identifier generated by EagleView when a report is ordered.

Street.description: First line of the street address for the ordered report.

BuildingId.description: When there are multiple structures at the same address, each structure is identified by giving an ID. This ID is known as the BuildingId.

City.description: Name of the city for the ordered report.

Zip.description: Zip code of the property for the ordered report.

Latitude.description: Lattitude of the property for the ordered report.

Longitude.description: Longitude of the property for the ordered report.

ClaimNumber.description: Customer provided claim number for this report.

ClaimInfo.description: Customer provided claim information for this report.

BatchId.description: Custom batch Id for this report.

DatePlaced.description: The date and time of when the report was ordered.

DateCompleted.description: The date and time of when the report was completed. If the report is not complete, the value 'null' is returned.

PONumber.description: Customer provided PO number for this report.

ReferenceId.description: Customer provided referenceId used for returning data to customer APIs.

InsuredName.description: Customer provided insured name for this report.

MeasurementRequestType.description: The value of the type of measurement instruction that was applied when the report was ordered

ReportDownloadLink.description: URL to download EagleView generated PDF report.

EligibleForUpgrade.description: Indicates if this report is eligible for an upgrade or not.

Status.description: Showing the progress of the report within the EagleView workflow from  created to completed.

Area.description: Total area for the measured property in sq.ft.

Pitch.description: Primary pitch for the measured property.

LengthRidge.description: Total length of all ridges for the measured property.

LengthValley.description: Total length of all valleys for the measured property.

LengthEave.description: Total length of all eaves for the measured property.

LengthRake.description: Total length of all rakes for the measured property.

AllowsUserSubmittedPhotos.description: Indicates if user submitted photos will appear on report if uploaded by user.

LengthHip.description: Total length of all hips for the measured property.

SubstituteFromProduct.description: The name of the previous product is returned if a substitution was made. If not, the value 'null' is returned.

SubstituteToProduct.description: The name of the current product is returned if a substitution was made. If not, the value 'null' is returned..

CanCancelReport.description: Determines if the report can be canceled based on its current status.

TotalRoofFacets.description: Total number of roof facets for the measured property.

textToFilterBy.description: Text to apply in the field filter.

sortAscending.description: Indicates if the sort can be ascending or descending.

Id.description: Report ID. Unique identifier generated by EagleView when a report is ordered

AllowsUserSubmittedPhotos.description: Indicates if user submitted photos will appear on report if uploaded by user.

TotalOfReports.description: Total number of reports provided within the request.

Address.description: Comma separated string in the following format "Address,City,State Zip,Country".

AvailabilityStatus.description: Array of solar product availability by Product. True is available. False is not available.

RequestId.description: RequestId for solar product availability API call.

Address.example: 2001 Via Teca, San Clemente, California 92673, United States
Address.description: Comma separated string in the following format "Address,City,State Zip,Country".

VintageExtension.description: For orders that contain solar shade analysis. True allows for imagery up to 8 years old. False allows for imagery up to 4 years old.

Value.description: Value for related Attribute found in the description column of the Available Attributes table.

BuildingId.description: When there are multiple structures at the same address, each structure is identified by giving an ID. This ID is known as the BuildingId.

ClaimNumber.description: Customer provided claim number for this report.

ClaimInfo.description: Customer provided claim information for this report.

BatchId.description: Custom batch Id for this report.

ChangesInLast4Years.description: Indicates if there have been changes at this address in the past 4 years.

PONumber.description: Customer provided PO number for this report.

ReferenceId.description: Customer provided referenceId used for returning data to customer APIs.

InsuredName.description: Customer provided insured name for this report.

UpgradeFromReportId.description: Id of the report that is being upgraded.

PolicyNumber.description: Customer provided policy number for this report.

ReportIds.description: Collection of reportIds for new reports.

ReportId.description: Unique identifier generated by EagleView when a report is ordered.

AdditionalEmails.description: Comma separated list of emails to be added as delivery recipients.

ClaimNumber.description: Customer provided claim number for this report.

ClaimInfo.description: Customer provided claim information for this report.

PONumber.description: Customer provided PO number for this report.

Description.description: Description of the discount applicable to the order.

RejectionMessage.description: Explanation of why the promo code is not applicable to the order.

MinPrice.description: Minimum total price for the order.

MaxPrice.description: Maximum total price for the order.

Waste %.description: Returns “0%” with no suggested waste, and three suggested waste % values. The middle one is the suggested factor, however you can also use the slightly higher or lower value.

Area (sq ft).description: Returns Area in Sq Ft for all “Waste %” values (0%, as well as the three suggested values).

Squares *.description: Returns count of Squares for all “Waste %” values (0%, as well as the three suggested values).

Measured.description: If AllPitchesUnderThreshold is True, will return the Measured Area in Sq Ft and count of Squares.

Complexity.description: Text descriptor of complexity. (Simple, Normal, Complex)

StructureNumber.description: Identification number for each structure in the report.  Starts at 1.

ModelId.description: Identification number for each model for that structure. Default is Null

AllPitchesUnderThreshold.description: T/F. Suggested Waste Factor is only calculated for pitches > 3/12. If all pitches are under the 3/12 Threshold, will return True. In that case all suggested waste measurements will return as dashes, and the Measured Column will only return the actual measured Area in Sq Ft and Squares.

grant_type_initial.description: Replace `Username` and `Password` placeholders with variable values. Example: `grant_type=password&username=Username&password=Password`

grant_type_refresh.description: Refresh token provided in Initial token response. Example: `grant_type=refresh_token&refresh_token=refresh_token`

access_token.description: Included in the Authorization header of every API call.  Expires after 24 hours.

token_type.description: Included at the start of the Authorization header.

expires_in.description: Seconds until the access_token expires. This value can change between token issues and should be treated as dynamic.

refresh_token.description: Refresh token for issuing a new access token.

as:client_id.description: GUID Provided by EagleView to identify the calling application. Passed back for validation.

EffectiveDate.description: Date and time which the file was generated.

LengthRake.description: Total length of the building's rakes.

LengthStepFlashing.description: Total length of the step flashings.

WallsMasonryArea.description: Total Masonry Area of the building. Only present in Walls, Windows & Doors and Walls reports.

AreaValue.description: Area of the roof of the building.

PitchValue.description: Slope of the roof of the building.

LengthRake.description: Total length of all rakes for report.

AllowsUserSubmittedPhotos.description: Indicates if user submitted photos will appear on report if uploaded by user.

SubstituteToProduct.description: Current product name if substitution was made.

CanCancelReport.description: Determines if the report can be canceled based on its current status.

billingExists.description: Indicates if billing exists against the user.

sortAscending.description: Indicates if the sort can be ascending or descending.

textToFilterBy.description: Value to apply to the specified key in fieldsToFilterBy.

referenceId.description: Include all reports that have this referenceId set at the time of order creation.

emailCC.description: Include all reports that match this CC email address.

fromDate.description: Include all reports ordered after this date (Format: yyyy-MM-dd).

toDate.description: Include all reports ordered before this date (Format: yyyy-MM-dd).

get.description: The GetAvailableProducts method is useful in determining which products are available to the authenticating customer.  This method is optional if it is already known which products are enabled on the authenticating user's account.

401.description: Provided Customer {0} Does Not Allow Authenticated User To GetAvailableProducts On Their Behalf

post.description: The PriceOrder method is useful in determining the price of an order.  This method is optional and not required when placing an order.

401.description: Provided PlaceOrderUser {0} Does Not Allow Authenticated User To Place Orders On Their Behalf

post.description: The PlaceOrder method is the primary mechanism of the ordering process, as it will actually create the order.  A successful PlaceOrder call will return a unique Report Id, which can then be used in other method calls.

400.description: Invalid credit card. Please verify your billing information and try again. Customer Service is available at 1-866-659-8439

401.description: Provided PlaceOrderUser {0} Does Not Allow Authenticated User To Place Orders On Their Behalf

get.description: GetAccountDetails API method is useful in determining if Billing exists for the user with passed token .

401.description: Unauthorized user. Please try again with authorized user

post.description:
The Product Availability API allows you to check if EagleView has the required imagery to process one or more Solar Products. This process only checks if imagery is available. EagleView can determine if the imagery is sufficient only after an order is placed for the requested product.

**NOTE:** This functionality only supports PrimaryProductIds 11, 62, 90, and 91.

500.description: An error occurred while processing the request

get.description: The GetReportUpgradeProducts method is useful in determining to which products the specified report can be upgraded.  It is suggested that this method be used before making the PlaceUpgradeOrder call so that the user can upgrade to one of the available products.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

404.description: Report data not found or user does not have access

500.description: Report cannot be upgraded as it has not been completed

post.description: The PlaceUpgradeOrder method is used for upgrading a report to a premium report.

200.description: Returns new ReportId of upgraded report.

400.description: Invalid credit card. Please verify your billing information and try again. Customer Service is available at 1-866-659-8439

404.description: Requested reports are invalid or ineligible for upgrade

500.description: Report cannot be upgraded as it has not been completed

get.description: The GetReport call will return information about a single report. Notable pieces of information include Status, ReportDownloadLink, and measurement totals.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

204.description: No data available for this report ID

401.description: Invalid ReportID or unauthorized user. Please try again with valid reportID or authorized user

post.description: The GetReports method will return specific pieces of data for a range of reports.  This method is generally used as a means of searching reports on the authenticated user's account.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Count of reports to return.

401.description: Authorization has been denied for this request

get.description: Receive order status updates to your webhook from EagleView.  Configure the Webhook Endpoint URL field within the application you create through this developer portal. Please note: when you are setting up the webhook on your side, your endpoint should end with "/OrderStatusUpdate".

parameters.name: StatusId
parameters.description: Status Ids

parameters.name: SubStatusId
parameters.description: SubStatus Ids

parameters.name: RefId
parameters.description: Unique Id that was passed as a reference by the client/partner when the order was placed with EagleView.

parameters.name: ReportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

200.description: A successful response is expected if the status update is received.

get.description: If the report is NPA (Not Parcel Accurate) then EagleView can notify an integration partner's hosted endpoint.  Please note that the URL should end with "NeedToId".

parameters.name: RefId
parameters.description: Unique Id that was passed as a reference by the client/partner when the order was placed with EagleView.

parameters.name: ReportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

parameters.name: VerifyId
parameters.description: URL Encoded NPA Link.

200.description: A successful response is required if the notification is successfully received.

get.description: The structure-waste-measurements call will return the Suggested Waste Factor data for each structure on an existing report

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

204.description: No measurements found for the report

401.description: Invalid ReportID or unauthorized user. Please try again with valid reportID or authorized user

post.description: The UpdateReportAddress method is used for updating the report address when a report is pending the customer's response to locate the appropriate structure.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Report Id of the report to which the report address will be updated.

post.description: The ApproveReportTypeChange method allows the authenticating user to approve a change in report type due to available imagery.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

401.description: Invalid ReportID or unauthorized user. Please try again with valid reportID or authorized user

post.description: The DenyReportTypeChange method allows the authenticating user to deny a change in report type due to available imagery.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

401.description: Invalid ReportID or unauthorized user. Please try again with valid reportID or authorized user

post.description: The CloseReport method allows the authenticating to close a report on their account.  This will stop processing on the report given it is not already completed.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

401.description: Invalid ReportID or unauthorized user. Please try again with valid reportID or authorized user

get.description: The GetReportFile method allows the authenticating user to retrieve files generated for a report. Please note that a report file can only be retrieved if it has been generated. If the user makes a request for a fileType and fileFormat that has not been generated, then the call will fail. Please reach out to the Integrations team to have a specific fileType and fileFormat generated.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: File Type

parameters.name: fileFormat
parameters.description: File Format

200.description: A byte array is returned of the file.

400.description: Invalid reportID. Please try again with a valid reportID

get.description: The GetReportFileAnyFormat method allows the authenticating user to retrieve files generated for a report. Please note that a report file can only be retrieved if it has been generated. If the user makes a request for a fileType that has not been generated, then the call will fail. Please reach out to the Integrations team to have a specific fileType generated.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: File Type

200.description: A byte array is returned of the file.

post.description: Receive completed order files to your webhook from EagleView.  Configure the Webhook Endpoint URL field within the application you create through this developer portal. Please note: when you are setting up the webhook on your side, your endpoint should end with "/FileDelivery".

parameters.name: RefId
parameters.description: Unique Id that was passed as a reference by the client/partner when the order was placed with EagleView.

parameters.name: ReportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

parameters.name: FileFormatId
parameters.description: File Format

parameters.name: FileTypeId
parameters.description: File Type

parameters.name: StructureID
parameters.description: EagleView’s unique structure id for the order.

200.description: A successful response is required if the file has been delivered successfully.

get.description: Upon delivering the files associated with a particular order, EagleView will make this call to confirm all the files are delivered.  Please note that the URL should end with "FileDeliveryConfirmation".

parameters.name: RefId
parameters.description: Unique Id that was passed as a reference by the client/partner when the order was placed with EagleView.

parameters.name: ReportId
parameters.description: Unique id generated by EagleView when an order is placed.

200.description: A successful response is required if all files have been delivered successfully.

get.description: The File-Links method allows the authenticating user to retrieve file download links generated for Solar Products such as Inform Reports and TrueDesign measurement data. Please note that a report file download link can only be retrieved if the files are available. Link will contain URL to referenced file for download.

parameters.name: reportId
parameters.description: Report Id.

enum: Deliverables not generated for this report

401.description: Only authorized report owner can make this request

basicAuth.description: Unique identifier and secret provided by EagleView Integration team.
